author: yetkinyilmaz
body:
There was a nested loop with same index name, I changed the indices to be more specific. It didn't cause harm, but was potentially dangerous. Build & -s matrix tested in slc6_amd64_gcc481, CMSSW_7_3_X_2014-11-11-0200
@cbaus to also follow the discussion.
title: Minor bugfix in GenParticleProducer
